page.title: 06An 11yr old in Wolverhampton
page.content: I like living in Low Hill because you always have something to do. I think that in some places in Low Hill it is not kept tidy.I think that it is the fault of the people themselves. I don't like the vandals in Low Hill and the trouble they cause.I saw one vandal throw a stone through my next door neighbour's window and it hit a 3 year old girl.I think that our street,Fourth Ave, looks like the countryside because there are lots of trees about.There are plenty of parks near my home,eg Fowlers Park,The Old Park (Adventure Playground)and the Bike Park.I think there should be play streets like Sharman Road,so there won't be as many accidents as there are now.When I was coming from school one afternoon I saw a boy knocked over by a car and I watched as he was taken to hospital.
